lead_paragraph: Facing challenges in its core business of short-term rentals, Airbnb is aiming to become a fuller-service travel company by connecting travelers with local guides.

headline.print_headline: Airbnb  Broadens  Its Business  With Tours
headline.main: Airbnb Broadens Its Business With Tours and Travel Experiences

snippet: Facing challenges in its core business of short-term rentals, Airbnb is aiming to become a fuller-service travel company by connecting travelers with local guides....
abstract: Airbnb launches Trips, service offering tours, tailored activities and other experiences to immerse travelers into local culture; program adds another revenue stream to company facing government pushback for problems related to its home-sharing rental service.
